el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=1 rooms_high=1
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world( levelw, levelh) enigma.SetCompatibility("oxyd1") enigma.ConserveLevel = 0
fill_floor("fl-bluegreen", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-blue-sand", i-1, line) elseif c =="B" then set_stone( "st-bombs", i-1, line) elseif c =="H" then set_stone( "st-stone_break", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-1,line+.5, {player=0}) elseif c == "g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c=="=" then set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c=="D" then set_item("it-dynamite",i-1,line) elseif c=="C" then set_item("it-crack3",i-1,line) elseif c=="S" then set_item("it-seed",i-1,line) elseif c=="h" then set_item("it-hammer",i-1,line) elseif c=="R" then set_stone("st-oneway_black", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.EAST}) elseif c=="L" then set_stone("st-oneway_black", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.WEST}) end end end
renderLine(00,"####################") renderLine(01,"#o CCCCRRCCCC o#") renderLine(02,"#o #B#B#B#B## o#") renderLine(03,"#o R HHHHHH L o#") renderLine(04,"#o R HHHHHH L o#") renderLine(05,"#BB R HHHHHH L BB#") renderLine(06,"#SL zR gHHHHg C DRh#") renderLine(07,"#BB R HHHHHH L BB#") renderLine(08,"#o R HHHHHH L o#") renderLine(09,"#o R HHHHHH L o#") renderLine(10,"#o ##B#B#B#B# o#") renderLine(11,"#o CCCCLLCCCC o#") renderLine(12,"####################")
